description: Cross-language integration tests, benchmarks, and docs

userStories.title: Integration test harness
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a harness to run cross-language tests.
acceptanceCriteria: integration-tests can start relay and SDK clients
Harness documents required env vars and ports
userStories.notes: Added integration-tests/run_relay.py and integration-tests/README.md documenting env/ports.

userStories.title: Interop: Python publish to relay, TypeScript subscribe
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a test where Python publishes and TypeScript receives.
acceptanceCriteria: Test sends event from Python SDK through relay
TypeScript SDK receives event and verifies event_id
userStories.notes: Added interop harness integration-tests/run_interop.py and node/python scripts for publish/subscribe.

userStories.title: Interop: TypeScript publish to relay, Python subscribe
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a test where TypeScript publishes and Python receives.
acceptanceCriteria: Test sends event from TypeScript SDK through relay
Python SDK receives event and verifies event_id
userStories.notes: Interop harness runs TS publish -> Python subscribe via integration-tests/run_interop.py and scripts.

userStories.title: Interop: filter behavior
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want filter tests to match spec across SDKs.
acceptanceCriteria: Test covers kind, pubkey prefix, tags, since, until
Same events yield same results in Python and TypeScript

userStories.title: Benchmark: relay throughput
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want relay throughput benchmarks.
acceptanceCriteria: Benchmark script measures events/sec on relay

userStories.title: Benchmark: Python SDK publish rate
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want Python SDK publish benchmarks.

userStories.title: Benchmark: TypeScript SDK publish rate
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want TypeScript SDK publish benchmarks.
userStories.notes: Added TypeScript SDK benchmark script integration-tests/bench/bench_ts_sdk.js.

userStories.title: Docs: relay deployment quickstart
userStories.description: As a developer, I want minimal relay deployment instructions.
acceptanceCriteria: README or docs include relay install/run steps
Docs list required ports and config values
userStories.notes: Updated README.md with relay quickstart instructions.

userStories.title: Docs: Python SDK quickstart
userStories.description: As a developer, I want Python SDK quickstart examples.
userStories.notes: Updated README.md with Python SDK quickstart example.

userStories.title: Docs: TypeScript SDK quickstart
userStories.description: As a developer, I want TypeScript SDK quickstart examples.
userStories.notes: Updated README.md with TypeScript SDK quickstart example.

userStories.title: Docs: framework integration examples
userStories.description: As a developer, I want LangChain and Vercel AI SDK integration examples.
acceptanceCriteria: Docs include Vercel AI SDK integration example
userStories.notes: README.md already includes LangChain/Vercel AI SDK examples (existing content).
